lines.text: Of course you know this means war!
That was weawwy an awfuwwy good weg of wamb.
Okay, so I got thrown out. I suppose none of you have ever been thrown out of noplace!

[looking at newspaper]
I wonder how Dick Twacy made out today.
How do you like this guy? He saves my life. And after all the things I've done to him in this picture.
Look at him stuffing himself while poor little rabbits lie out here starving!
My what? My dinner! What do you think I am... a rabbit? I'll starve before I eat this stuff.
You'll be sorry... starving a little gray rabbit! This is terrible! Me eating this stuff! How do you expect me to stomach this stuff?
[Elmer turns on the light to his bedroom - Bugs is in his bed 'sleeping']
